allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az graph query -q ""Resources | where type in~ \(''microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'', ''microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'', ''microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools''\) | summarize count\(\) by type"" --first 100 -o json 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "az rest --method post --url ''https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.ResourceGraph/resources?api-version=2022-10-01'' --body ''{""query"": ""Resources | where type in~ \(''''microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'''', ''''microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'''', ''''microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools''''\) | summarize count\(\) by type""}'' -o json 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "$body = @{ query = ""Resources | where type in~ \(''microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'', ''microsoft.storage/storageaccounts'', ''microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools''\) | summarize count\(\) by type"" } | ConvertTo-Json; $body | Out-File -FilePath $env:TEMP\\rgquery.json -Encoding utf8; az rest --method post --url ''https://management.azure.com/providers/Microsoft.ResourceGraph/resources?api-version=2022-10-01'' --body ''@'' -o json < $env:TEMP\\rgquery.json 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "az rest --method get --url ''https://management.azure.com/subscriptions?api-version=2022-12-01'' -o json 2>&1 | ConvertFrom-Json | Select-Object -ExpandProperty value | Measure-Object | Select-Object -ExpandProperty Count")
